name: Space Warp (itch) (Afthen [DEV])
description:
Warp space by picking a side to avoid deadly lazers that can kill you in 3 hits.

Controls

  • Use [WASD] to move the ship around

Music: Blueberry - Prod. Riddiman

Download the Windows version for better playing experience.

You can set the live wallpaper using Lively Wallpaper by rocksdanister:

  1. Open Lively Wallpaper.
  2. Click "Add Wallpaper".
  3. Browse for the .zip file that you have downloaded (make sure to not extract it).
  4. Click the new wallpaper to set it as your wallpaper
